content.brief:
We are committed to providing access to all individuals—with or without disabilities—seeking information on cyber.gov. To provide this information, we have built cyber.gov to conform to Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act (as amended). Section 508 requires that all individuals with disabilities (whether Federal employees or members of the general public) have access to, and use of, information and data comparable to that provided to individuals without disabilities, unless doing so would impose an undue burden.

If you use assistive technology (e.g., a screen reader, eye tracking device, voice recognition software) and have difficulty accessing information on cyber.gov, please email us at OMBCyber@omb.eop.gov. If you do email us, please write “508 Compliance” in the subject line of your email and provide the URL (web address) of the material you tried to access and a description of the problem you experienced. This will help us address the issue more quickly.
